attributes.action: Appoint Jeremy Clarkson as the next Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jeremy Clarkson is as close to a God that any mere mortal will get. He can only be described as a dazzling hero of political incorrectness. 

His straight forward no nonsense attitude would make our country great once more. 

And on that bombshell, I ask you to sign this petition, to make him the next PM, or at least encourage him to enter politics and bring back some common sense to Westminster once again!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
